definition: a mechanical device that prevents a vessel from moving, to secure a vessel with an anchor or weight
details:
noun
- a mechanical device that prevents a vessel from moving
= synonyms: ground tackle
- a central cohesive source of support and stability
= example: a central cohesive source of support and stability
= synonyms: backbone, keystone, linchpin, lynchpin, mainstay
- a television reporter who coordinates a broadcast to which several correspondents contribute
= synonyms: anchorman
verb
- to secure a vessel with an anchor or weight
= example: to secure a vessel with an anchor or weight
= synonyms: cast anchor, drop anchor
- to fix firmly and stably
= example: to fix firmly and stably
= synonyms: ground
